original_title: ほんとにあった!呪いのビデオ 76
overview: A video taken by a man of the author at an Indian water wheel facility installed in a river when he traveled to Hokkaido. A large number of salmon are swimming through the glass. When the poster was reflecting the camera close to the glass and reflected in the water, something like a human head drifted in it and approaching the glass surface ...
title: Honto ni Atta! Noroi No Video 76
